main event: An observer watched a bullet-shaped object with a yellowish inside area changing to a reddish hue on the edges that disappeared toward the north.
interesting points: The object had no exhaust or propulsion observed.
The observer thought it might have been 'shot out of something'.
The short duration prevented a more complete description of the object.
A hand-drawn sketch depicts a saucer-shaped object that could descend and become a submarine.
Another witness reported seeing a 'submarine-shaped' unidentified flying object in 1964.
sighted object: bullet-shaped object with a yellowish and reddish hue
